title: New: Blackbird Blackbird – New Leaf
body:
It’s been a while since we last heard from the prolific **Blackbird Blackbird**, and it appears that in that time he’s been keeping pretty busy.

Having toyed with the concept of putting out stems for a previously unreleased track for people to remix, **Mikey** has dropped a new cut in the form of the deliriously upbeat _New Leaf_. At six and a half minutes long, there’s plenty to immerse yourself in, amongst the jangly electronic sections and reverb-laden vocals. Download the stems [here](http://www.sendspace.com/file/e7qesm), and check out _New Leaf_ below.

 [New Leaf](http://soundcloud.com/blackbirdblackbirdsf/new-leaf) by [BLACKBIRD BLACKBIRD](http://soundcloud.com/blackbirdblackbirdsf)

Photo by [Alex Greenburg](http://alexgreenburg.com/)
